tool.name: VLT.convert_sam

param.name: flank_size
param.label: size of the flanks to extract around the SNP. Has no effect with VL marker alignment output type

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool converts SAM alignment data to VL marker alignment or Galaxy extract genomic DNA input.
Expects single-end BWA alignment data produced by the previous steps in the workflow (see markers_to_fastq).
**NOTE:** if the marker_alignment output format is selected, the Database/Build property must be set in the input SAM file.
